title: What are the best innovative ideas ever? - Quora

response.answer_text: Innovation is comes from the needs which we are have is not available completely. Everybody has innovative thinking, some are show their talent as output, some are dreaming about their innovative idea. Today we are using these creative things because of the innovators who put their ideas into reality and they are succeeded, some are failed with lack of improvements. Best Innovative ideas according to me is LED Traffic Lights,    Mirror wiper  360° Lego Sockets   Twister fork  Baby shower cap  Reusable candle  And many more things are there, In you also creative person are there when you put your idea in realistic please reply to this post. Thank You.

I recently got to know about a company 'Oxitec' which cultures and grows transgenic male mosquitoes (A. Aegypti) in an effort to curb dengue. Once these are released into the dengue vulnerable area, these get mated with the female wild mosquitoes there and produces offspring with a modified protein variant which is lethal enough to make the majority die before maturing.  It seems like such an innovative idea and it got pilot tested at Cayman island, Malaysia and came out with appreciable results (96%reduction in the mosquito population). The project already got scaled up and had its field test done in Piracycaba, Brazil (covering 10s of 1000s of people) recently and they are in talks with other municipalities for its expansion. A great initiative for dengue less future!!
